New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored a 50 that guided India to Super 8s with a win against USA
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli was dismissed for a golden duck by Saurabh Netravalkar
Rohit Sharma was dismissed for 3 runs by Saurabh Netravalkar
Rishabh Pant was dismissed for 18 runs by Ali Khan
Arshdeep Singh took 4 wickets to restrict USA to 110/8
Suryakumar Yadav scored 50 runs to guide India to a 7-wicket win
Pre-Game Insights: India's Rohit Sharma said they would bowl first, as the wicket has played better in the last two games
USA's Aaron Jones said they would have bowled first as well, but they have some help for the bowlers early
Post-Match Reflections: India's Suryakumar Yadav said he was happy with the performance, and the team showed belief in him
USA's Aaron Jones said they were 10-15 runs short, and the boys were disciplined
India's Arshdeep Singh said he was very happy with the performance, and the team always shows belief in him
Miscellaneous Highlights: The USA team was penalized 5 runs due to slow over rate
The wicket was conducive to fast bowlers, and it helped India get some seam movement
Others: India won the match by 7 wickets and confirmed their berth in the Super 8s
The match was played at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York
